QueryResult.text: ( SELECT t.COMPANY_CODE, t.COMPANY_NAME, t.PROJECT_CODE, t.PROJECT_NAME, t.ProjRevision, t.APPROVEDBY_RESOURCE_CODE, t.DateApproved, t.DateRevised, t.Labor, t.Costs, t.Expenses, t.Contingency,t.Admin, t.Total, (SELECT t1.Labor - t2.Labor FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetLabor", (SELECT t1.Costs - t2.Costs FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetCosts", (SELECT t1.Expenses - t2.Expenses FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetExpenses", ( SELECT t1.Contingency - t2.Contingency FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetContingency", (SELECT t1.Admin - t2.Admin FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetAdmin", ( SELECT t1.Total - t2.Total FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t1, temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t2 WHERE t.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.COMPANY_CODE = t2.COMPANY_CODE and t1.PROJECT_CODE = t2.PROJECT_CODE and t1.ProjRevision = 0 and t2.ProjRevision = t2.MaxRevision ) "NetTotal" FROM temp_temprpt_GetBudgetRevAnaly t)
